name: AR Basketball One
description:
This is an exciting game in augmented reality.
Play Basketball anywhere - directly at home, in the office or even on the street, when there is no real basketball ring nearby.
Play one or in company with your friends. Throw balls, score points and beat records.
Fans of the game of basketball will not remain indifferent.

Features of the game
• Augmented Reality
• Magnificent graphics makes the virtual graphics indistinguishable from the real
• Realistic sound allows you to finally believe in the reality of what is happening
• 5 game modes including 2 multiplayer won't get bored
• Detailed statistics
• The record table gives an opportunity to compete with people from all over the world

Well, now, try to get into the ring!
